entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:21 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of snow or rain. High plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of snow or rain. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of snow. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. High plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
